meanings.sent1: The movie was so gushy, with all the characters expressing their love openly.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a gushy letter to her best friend, telling her how much she missed her.
meanings.sent3: The gushy greeting card made everyone in the room tear up with its heartfelt message.
meanings.sent4: His gushy speech at the wedding brought tears to everyone's eyes.
meanings.sent5: The gushy music in the background added to the emotional atmosphere of the scene.

meanings.definition: Emitting a sudden and abundant flow of liquid
meanings.sent1: The burst pipe created a gushy mess in the basement.
meanings.sent2: The gushy fountain in the park delighted the children on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The gushy water balloon exploded all over the backyard, soaking everyone.
meanings.sent4: The gushy rain poured down from the dark clouds, drenching the streets.
meanings.sent5: The gushy burst of juice from the overripe fruit surprised everyone at the picnic.

meanings.definition: Characterized by unrestrained enthusiasm or emotion
meanings.sent1: Her gushy reaction to winning the award was contagious, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent2: The gushy cheers of the crowd filled the stadium as their team scored a goal.
meanings.sent3: His gushy excitement over the new video game was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The gushy laughter of the children echoed through the playground.
meanings.sent5: The gushy hugs from her family made her feel truly loved and appreciated.
